adjectives.description: ascensive (comparative more ascensive, superlative most ascensive)

entries.meaning: Rising; tending to rise, or causing to rise.
examples: Had I been guided in this ascensive survey of the dental system by the general perfection of the species , I must have ended with that of Man
[â€¦]  it seems, however, highly probable that this is due rather to non-observance of the true ascensive force of the particle than to any real absence in the original MSS.
